title: Toms Shoe Adds More Sneakers in Turnaround Bid
itunes:title: Toms Shoe Adds More Sneakers in Turnaround Bid
description:
Dr. Caitlin Rivers, Senior Scholar at the Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security at the Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses the battle between Covid vaccines and new variants. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sri Natarajan share the story of how Bill Hwang was a $20 billion whale, then lost it all in two days. Bloomberg News Retail Reporter Jordyn Holman explains how Toms Shoes is plotting a comeback that includes a deeper push into sneakers. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Jackson, President of EMJ Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
